edu.ncsu.csc.itrust.dao.mysql

类 RemoteMonitoringDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc.itrust.dao.mysql.RemoteMonitoringDAO

  • public class RemoteMonitoringDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for the keeping track of remote monitoring data. DAO stands for Database Access Object. All DAOs are intended to be reflections of the database, that is, one DAO per table in the database (most of the time). For more complex sets of queries, extra DAOs are added. DAOs can assume that all data has been validated and is correct. DAOs should never have setters or any other parameter to the constructor than a factory. All DAOs should be accessed by DAOFactory (@see DAOFactory) and every DAO should have a factory - for obtaining JDBC connections and/or accessing other DAOs.

      • storePatientData

        public void storePatientData(long patientMID,
                    int systolicBloodPressure,
                    int diastolicBloodPressure,
                    int glucoseLevel,
                    java.lang.String reporterRole,
                    long reporterMID)
                      throws DBException,
                             iTrustException
        Store data for a given patient in the RemoteMonitoringData table
        参数:
        patientMID - The MID of the patient
        systolicBloodPressure - The systolic blood pressure of the patient
        diastolicBloodPressure - The diastolic blood pressure of the patient
        glucoseLevel - The glucose level of the patient
        reporterRole - The role of the person that reported these monitoring stats
        reporterMID - The MID of the person that reported these monitoring stats
        抛出:
        DBException
        iTrustException
